We really want you to keep your supercharged job hunt experience with us!
Would 15% off 1 year help you out?
(so if you‚Äôre a student, you‚Äôd get a whopping 65% off!!!)

summary.title: Overview Summary:
summary.text: This area allows viewers to meet you and get a quick glimpse of who you are!

timeline.title: Overview Timeline:
timeline.text: Your timeline is a birdseye view of your academic and professional journey! Showcase your education, experience, certificates and skills!

culture_fit.title: Culture Fit:
culture_fit.text: You‚Äôre more than just a job title. We want you to share the things that make you tick from social causes and non-profits to things that motivate you in your day-to-day!

content.title: Content:
content.text: You‚Äôre more than just a job title. We want you to share the things that make you tick from social causes and non-profits to things that motivate you in your day-to-day!

eportfolio_tour.first_step: Hey what‚Äôs up! Let‚Äôs get right into the 4 types of content you can add to your job pitches.
eportfolio_tour.add_content: You‚Äôre here so I think it‚Äôs safe to assume you know that content is what really showcases your skillset, not resumes. Here‚Äôs what we got for you!
eportfolio_tour.video_button: Let‚Äôs see how easy it is to upload a video. Like instagram but make it ‚ú® professional‚ú®
eportfolio_tour.video_page: Alright enough funny business. Click on this section to upload your video file!
eportfolio_tour.page: When we say professional brand & you think I get that but not really? This is the perfect place to start. Select a suggested thumbnail or upload a little somethin somethin that really embodies your work!
eportfolio_tour.title: Add a title & description (you‚Äôll see this in pretty much all of our content types). Explain how this piece of content exhibits your skills or experiences
eportfolio_tour.hashtags:
We all know #hashtags.
It makes sense, it helps us keep track of things & here at Sizigi it helps those hiring teams understand what this piece of content is all about!
eportfolio_tour.create_blog: Let‚Äôs power through! We promise we‚Äôll make this as painless as possible. BLOGS!
eportfolio_tour.cover_image: You know the drill. Cover image, done! Trust when I say that this is super important. After all, a picture is worth a thousand words right?
eportfolio_tour.fun_part: Let‚Äôs get to the fun part ‚úçüèº   (pssst it‚Äôs easier than it looks)
eportfolio_tour.highlight: There are plenty of text editing tools available! Just highlight the word & type away (or just copy paste the final version from your notes or google doc like a normal person)
eportfolio_tour.plus_button: Did you notice this tiny little guy over here?
eportfolio_tour.plus_step: By clicking on ‚Äú+‚Äù & you‚Äôll see two options. 1) The camera allows you to embed images & GIFs and 2) ‚Äú<>‚Äù allows you to embed links so the viewer can see a variety of different media without ever leaving your blog
eportfolio_tour.end_publish: Another one downüèãüèº‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è just hit publish & that‚Äôs a wrap!
eportfolio_tour.link_doc: I deem you, an Library PRO‚Ä¶ Unless you weren‚Äôt really paying attention. Don‚Äôt worry we all blank out here & there. If you ever need help, we‚Äôll be chilling in the drop-down of your profile picture!
eportfolio_tour.pitch_icon:
DRUM ROLL PLEASE ü•Å you‚Äôre now ready to start creating some job pitches that really stand out!

 Imposter Syndrome, BEGONE!

step1.title: Create Your Pitch
step1.description:
Send an application worth remembering! Pitches summarize who you are, what you do and why you'd be a perfect candidate. 
Remember, you only get one chance to make a first impression.

title.label: Pitch title
title.placeholder: This will be shared with viewers and for the organization of your pitches
title.hint: This will be shared with viewers and for the organization of your pitches

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: Who is it for, why are you applying?

job.label: Job link
job.placeholder: If pitch is for one specific application, add job link
job.hint: If pitch is for one specific application, add job link

description_input.label: Description
description_input.hint: For a customized intro with your share link, add their first and last name
description_input.placeholder: For a customized intro with your share link, add their first and last name

step2.title: Cover video
step2.description:
89% of employers prefer candidates submit a video in their application to assess cultural fit. 
Add a short intro of yourself for hiring teams. Make it personal to the company and the role you‚Äôre applying for. Want max engagement? We recommend 1-2 minutes.

video.label: Video
video.upload_description: Accepts all major video file types.
video.support: Your browser does not support HTML5 video.
video.checkbox: Use your previously recorded summary video instead

step3.title: Configure Content
step3.description:
You‚Äôre a driven professional with strong skills and capabilities, but proving your expertise in your field is an important factor to getting hiring. 
 Select, upload, and arrange content from your library to establish yourself as an expert in this position!

pricing.title: Plans & Pricing
pricing.description: Get the power, control, and customization you need to supercharge your job hunt.

free.title: Free For Life
free.description: You‚Äôre looking to start creating and storing content you can keep for life as a guide to your career journey.
free.short_description: For those getting started with a new job search

starter.title: Professional Trailblazer
starter.description: You‚Äôre a trailblazer! You‚Äôre seeking to connect with hiring teams through engaging personalized job pitches that will help you stand out in the hiring process.
starter.short_description: For trailblazers looking to get hired quickly

premium.title: Premium Job Seeker
premium.description: You want to maximize your opportunity to get hired by sending unique job pitches to each of your targeted audiences and understand their engagement with your content.
premium.short_description: For those seeking maximize their career goals

resumes.free_trial: Your card will not be charged until the end of your 14 days free trial.

modal_success_payment.title: Your now on the {PLAN} Plan
modal_success_payment.resume: Woohoo! Your new subscription gives you access to more tools and features to show off those skills and experiences in the jobs you're tracking. Better start getting your interview outfit ready!

plan_starter.title: Starter Plan
plan_starter.description: This is a free plan and with it you will not have insights and metrics about your pitches and library.

plan_analytics.title: Premium Analytics plan
plan_analytics.description: You have the analytics plan and with it you have insights and metrics about your pitches and library.
plan_analytics.renewal: Your plan renewal date will be every {RENEWAL}.
plan_analytics.canceled: On {DATE_CANCEL}, you canceled your subscription renewal. The features of your plan will be available until {DATE_AVAILABLE}. After that, you can renew your subscription.

no_invoices.title: No invoices
no_invoices.description: You don't have any invoices yet.

no_disputes.title: No refunds or disputes
no_disputes.description: You have no open disputes or refund orders. If you need help, send us a message.

consumption_rate.tooltip: Consumption rate is a metric that tells you how much of your content is being consumed each time your pitch is viewed. The formula is total content views / total presentation views

engagement.tooltip: Engagement rate is a metric that tells you how much your audience is engaging with your pitch.  The formula is the average content views in a presentation  / average content packaged in a presentation

analytics_banner.label_pitch: Maximize your job search using our analytics dashboard!

reward.title: Woohoo you have a prize!
reward.paragraph_three: Time to supercharge your job hunt.

board.content_first_access:
Welcome to your application tracker!
Here are 3 things you need to know to get started.

1. The left is where you can access your different boards and contact list (available soon).
2. Each swimlane represents where each job is in it‚Äôs application journey.
3. You can click-and-drag your job card between swimlanes.
